text: Weird Science is a 1985 American science fiction fantasy comedy movie written and directed by John Hughes, starring Anthony Michael Hall, Kelly LeBrock, Bill Paxton, Robert Downey Jr., Vernon Wells, Ilan Mitchell-Smith. It was distributed by Universal Pictures and was spun off into TV series in 1994. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:1985 fantasy movies Category:1985 science fiction movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:Movies directed by John Hughes Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies adapted into television series Category:Movies set in Illinois
title: Weird Science (movie)
